name: Bugs of Planet Dune
description:
Bugs of Planet Dune

Hint: Search for the gate keys inside buildings or in front of gates.

Coursera Modifications: 

Expanded Level 1. Decorated both levels. Created and mostly used 3 new terrain layers (fungus color). Changed the Portal with my own glowing animated light.

Playable on Mac, Windows, Web Credit: Daniel R.
